name: Shoeter
description:
Explore five different levels as you, the Shoes, help guide the Guy through them. Use your keyboard and mouse to aim and shoot the Guy. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and get to the end of the level for a delicious Used Band-aid Sandwich.

FEATURES:

- The Main Game

- Bonus Levels

- Concept Art

TOOLS USED:

- Microsoft Visual Studio 2010

- Microsoft XNA

- GIMP

- Blender (with the COA Tools plugin | https://github.com/ndee85/coa_tools)

- Bosca Ceoil

- Audacity

CREDITS:

- Programming: Scott Predmore | https://github.com/spredmore/Shoeter

- Art / Animation: Scott Predmore

- Music: Scott Predmore

- Concept: Scott Predmore / Dann Herwerden
